LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectHeavyMech.label: Resurrect heavy automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectHeavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly automatroid of the heavy weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectMediumMech.label: Resurrect medium automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectMediumMech.description: Resurrect a friendly automatroid of the medium weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectUltraheavyMech.label: Resurrect ultraheavy automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectUltraheavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly automatroid of the ultraheavy weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
